headings.text: NFL 2025 - WEEK 7 Schedule | NFL.com
NFL Schedule
2025 — WEEK 7
Thursday, October 16th
Sunday, October 19th
Monday, October 20th
TEAMS ON BYE
Thursday Night Football
Sunday Night Football
Monday Night Football
2025 TBD Games
We Care About Your Privacy

We and our partners process data collected via optional cookies (e.g., pixels) that are grouped, based on functionality, into the following categories: Performance, Functional, and Targeting. Depending on the category, these cookies may be utilized by the NFL and our partners for the following purposes:
About Your Privacy
Manage Consent Preferences
Strictly Necessary
Performance
Functional
Targeting
Personalised advertising and content, advertising and content measurement, audience research and services development 869 partners can use this purpose
Use limited data to select advertising 679 partners can use this purpose
Create profiles for personalised advertising 573 partners can use this purpose
Use profiles to select personalised advertising 576 partners can use this purpose
Create profiles to personalise content 252 partners can use this purpose
Use profiles to select personalised content 227 partners can use this purpose
Measure advertising performance 741 partners can use this purpose
Measure content performance 353 partners can use this purpose
Understand audiences through statistics or combinations of data from different sources 489 partners can use this purpose
Develop and improve services 543 partners can use this purpose
Use limited data to select content 153 partners can use this purpose
Store and/or access information on a device 761 partners can use this purpose
Use precise geolocation data 283 partners can use this special feature
Actively scan device characteristics for identification 153 partners can use this special feature
Ensure security, prevent and detect fraud, and fix errors 582 partners can use this special purpose
Deliver and present advertising and content 581 partners can use this special purpose
Match and combine data from other data sources 415 partners can use this feature
Link different devices 355 partners can use this feature
Identify devices based on information transmitted automatically 549 partners can use this feature
Save and communicate privacy choices 429 partners can use this special purpose
Cookie List
